mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum, p.* from (select product_no as productNo, class_no as classNo, product_name as productName, product_price as productPrice, to_char(product_price, '999,999,999') as wonprice, product_status as productStatus, product_category as productCategory, product_subname as productSubName, product_qty as productQty, product_imgname as productImgName, product_imgpath as productImgPath, product_content as productContent from products order by 1 desc)p) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
